1.0.name: wordpress/twickit
1.0.description:
This plugin adds some Twick.it functions into your wordpress blog.

First you can mark phrases with a [twickit] tag. The plugin looks up the phrase at Twick.it. If there is a definition for the phrase it will be shown both as a tooltip and with a link to the adequate page at Twick.it.

If you want the plugin to find any word with a corresponding Twick.it-definition in a paragraph you can surround the textblock with [twickitall]. The plugin will look up any word in the marked block.

Last but not least you can enable the so called Marker-Popup-Feature. If enabled your readers can mark any phrase in your blog to look it up at Twick.it. After marking a text with the cursor a small popup will show the available definitions at Twick.it.
